title: The Puppeteer's Troupe
subtitle: Graduation Project
description: For my graduation project I planned to develop a tabletop RPG which aimed to trigger critical thought about gender roles and gender expression in its participants; and using tech as a tool to break through the medium's pen & paper traditions to achieve this goal as effectively as possible.

Game Design: Designing a character creation system which imposes roles onto the players.
Designing 3 archetypes (or classes) for playtesting purposes.
Narrative Design: Establishing a narrative theme in collaboration with a visual artist.
Developing an NPC playbook for the main antagonist of the experience, The Puppeteer.
